text: Exercise 1 Give regular expressions for each of the following languages over {a,b}. 1. fw | w contains an even number of a’s}; 2. {w | w contains an odd number of &'s); 3. fw | w contains an even number of a's or an odd number of b’s}; 4. {w | w does not contain the substring a); 5. fw | w does not contain the substring ab); 6. fw | w does not contain the substring aba}. Try to simplify the expressions as much as possible using the algebraic laws of regular expres- sions.
